Kūmara prices tipped to drop as supply improves after Cyclone Gabriellehttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/kumara-prices-tipped-to-drop-as-supply-improves-after-cyclone-gabrielle/46WOIG4UYZBTXK2ZO2YYGY36LU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/kumara-prices-tipped-to-drop-as-supply-improves-after-cyclone-gabrielle/46WOIG4UYZBTXK2ZO2YYGY36LU/ At its scarcest, some kūmara prices topped out at $14/kg. Dunedin CBD lights up for Pink concert at Forsyth Barr https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dunedin-cbd-lights-up-for-pink-concert-at-forsyth-barr/WJFSERRMPVFH5H64JBLQNAF6I4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dunedin-cbd-lights-up-for-pink-concert-at-forsyth-barr/WJFSERRMPVFH5H64JBLQNAF6I4/ Laine PriestleyAmerican singer Pink will perform at Dunedin’s Forsyth Barr Stadium tomorrow night. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 21:26:16 +0000 Dunedin’s St Paul’s Cathedral was lit up last night to celebrate the arrival of American pop singer Pink. Pink will perform at Forsyth Barr Stadium in front of more than 32,000 fans tomorrow night. Photo / Stephen Jacquiery
